job_tasks.phrase: design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the core activity of building and deploying AI-driven solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions the development and creation of various ML models, including generative ones.

job_tasks.phrase: optimize the engine's performance and efficiency
job_tasks.justification: Refers to improving the functionality and output of AI models and systems.

job_tasks.phrase: build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the development of products that will be used by customers or integrated into existing software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents
job_tasks.justification: Describes the development of a specific software component (inference engine) for AI agents.

job_tasks.phrase: empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants
job_tasks.justification: Connects the technical work to customer empowerment and business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives
job_tasks.justification: Indicates involvement in high-level planning and strategy for AI within the business.

job_tasks.phrase: staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology
job_tasks.justification: Implies maintaining and updating solutions to keep them current and competitive.

soft_skills.phrase: mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise in a collaborative environment
innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models
contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and implementing solutions using Large Language Models (LLMs) and other generative techniques. It also highlights building customer-facing products and applications around these models, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
